Name: Joan Yabani
Title: Team Coordinator
About:
Hailing from Accra, Ghana, I started my life in the Czech republic and grew up in Wake Forest, NC.

People are my passion, and improving the lives of those I come in contact with and around the world is my life's dream. I originally majored in Political Science and International Relations, but came to the realization that I could do more damage in Business. I consider myself the love child of strategy and creativity. Whether on a small or large scale, I love being a part of the process. Constantly looking for ways to improve and contribute.

In my free time i'm a personal trainer, foodie to the max, dance party enthusiast, Jesus lover, adventure seeker, and a firm believer that a nap a day, keeps the doctor away.
